name: Double Dose
description:
This game was made for the GMTK game jam.

Controls

WAD for movement

SPACE to shoot or attack

Tab to switch player

STORY

Two arch enemies were battling each for the last time. Unknown to them a ruler from another dimension was a big fan of their battle and he also wanted to have a taste of it. He summoned them to his realm (kidnapped he heh) told the  to fight him, but they refused, he then gave them a reason too. He fused their bodies together and casted them out of his sight. Told them to look for him and fight him. If they win he would return them back to normal else they'll be like that forever. 

OBJECTIVE

Find and defeat the ruler of the realm. Defeat all his minions and charge on.

ADVICE

The two players are two different persons with different abilities. One has heavy fire power (literally) 

but lack speed and vice versa.  And if one character dies game over.

Have fun 😁✌🏽
